com.threerings.riposte.server
Interface PostDispatcher

public interface PostDispatcher

Riposte Service dispatchers must implement this method. Given the method id and args array, they are responsible for calling the correct service method on the Service implementor.

The implementors of these interfaces are not usually written by hand - they are usually generated by the genriposte ant task, defined in GenRiposteTask. If this method is used, the service interface is required to have a service id defined in a public static string:

public static final int SERVICE_ID = 1;

Method Summary
 Object dispatchRequest(int methodId, Object[] args)
          Called by the RiposteManager when a service call for this service arrives at the server.
 

Method Detail

dispatchRequest

Object dispatchRequest(int methodId,
                       Object[] args)
                       throws Exception
Called by the RiposteManager when a service call for this service arrives at the server.

Parameters:
methodId - The id of the method being called. The dispatcher is responsible for maintaining a mapping of method id to service method.
args - The args for the method being called.
Returns:
If this method returns a value, return it here. If not, return null.
Throws:
Exception - If the service method throws an exception, let it pass through here. PostManager will catch the exception and send a StreamableError to the client with the exception's message.
